name: Two Swords
description:
Made with the intention of being built from scatch in 2 hours. In the end it took me about 15 hours. My goal was to make something small on a weekend and finally ship one of my little prototypes. There's about 20 levels and the game is super short but I'm happy with what's there.

Sorry there's no re-wind button, only restart.

Controls:

Move/Attack - WASD

Restart Level - R

Credits:

Nicholas McDonnell

Some sprites from https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=8834.0
